actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code in order to eliminate or reduce certain deductible payments by patients for treatment under the uniformed service health benefits program.

summary.text: Revises the schedule for deductible payments by patients for medical care and special education services under the health benefits program for spouses and children of members of the Armed Forces.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code in order to eliminate or reduce certain deductible payments by patients for treatment under the uniformed service health benefits program.
